features: EVERY PURCHASE SAVES PETS. BISSELL proudly supports BISSELL Pet Foundation and its mission to help save homeless pets.
LIGHTWEIGHT WITH POWERFUL SUCTION. Weighs less than 10 pounds, and picks up pet hair with strength and agility.
TANGLE-FREE BRUSH ROLL. Our patented brush roll is designed to eliminate annoying hair wrap.
3-IN-ONE CAPABILITIES. Transform this machine from a stick vacuum to a handheld or high-reach vacuum with ease.
SPECIALTY TOOLS INCLUDED. Comes with Crevice Tool, and Dusting Brush to clean hard-to-reach dirt and messes.
MESS-FREE MAINTENANCE. Featuring CleanSlide Technology, this machine works with the Easy Empty Dirt Tank for stress-free cleanout.
SWIVEL STEERING. More manueverability for multi-surface cleaning and the ability to tackle hard-to-reach places.
body.description: Pick up pet hair almost anywhere in your home with BISSELL® PowerGlide® Pet Slim corded vacuum. It's engineered with our patented Tangle-Free Brush Roll, so you don't have to worry about that annoying hair that gets wrapped around the brushes of other vacuums. We also gave it a 27-foot-long power cord, so you can clean large rooms without having to constantly find a new outlet. PowerGlide® Pet Slim machine converts to a handheld vacuum to clean upholstery, stairs, and other soft surfaces where pets like to leave hair behind. It also comes with an extension wand, so you can clean high and low hard-to-reach places around your home. It vacuums on hard floors, too. When you're done cleaning, maintaining this machine is easy with features like an Easy Empty™ dirt tank, CleanSlide® Technology, and washable filter. The vacuum, along with the included Crevice Tool and Dusting Brush gives you even more ability to tackle messes. This product doesn't just clean up after pets, it helps save them, too! BISSELL proudly supports BISSELL Pet Foundation® and its mission to help save homeless pets. When you buy a BISSELL® product, you help save pets, too. We’re proud to design products that help make pet messes, odors, and pet homelessness disappear.

How do I empty the dirt tank? With CleanSlide Technology, dirt and debris is removed when you pull the separator up from the dirt tank. To remove the tank from the machine, press the button directly above tank, and pull it out. Is it safe to use on wood floors? Yes, this vacuum safely cleans carpets and hard floors throughout your home. What tools does it come with? Your purchase includes a Pet TurboEraser Tool, Crevice Tool, Dusting Brush, Febreze Filter, and Wall Mount & Storage Station to easily store accessories. Can you turn the Brush Roll off? Yes, there is a Hard Floor setting with suction only and an Area Rug/Carpeting setting with suction and Brush Roll agitation. Is the filter washable? The Foam Pre-Motor filter (located on the top of the dirt tank) can be washed with warm water. Ensure the filter is completely dry before placing it back in the vacuum.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This little stick vacuum does a great job, it is lightweight and easy to use and has a great suction. I have enjoyed using it for messes that I quickly want to clean up. It is easier to handle than my big upright vacuum

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 14, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This sweeper sucks up all the cat hair & clay litter. Had to refer to user manual in getting canister off to empty it. Haven't attempted to attach it to my wall yet. Love that it is lightweight & that it reaches under my platform bed.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 8, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great little vacuum
reviews.reviewText: I should qualify my review by saying that this purchase replaced an ancient vacuum for me, so anything probably would've been better than what I had. But I love this little vacuum. And you cannot beat that price. I'm very impressed with the suction power. It works great on my tile floors, my low pile carpet, and my shaggy area rug. And it's super easy to move from one type of flooring to another. My dog sheds a lot, and it's embarrassing how much hair (and dirt) this thing removed. It fits all the way under every piece of furniture, which is so helpful for truly ridding the house of dog hair. It handles so well and I love how easy it is to maneuver around.Addressing some complaints of other customers:1) It does not stand on its own, but it does lay flat. So if you have to move furniture or stop midway to empty the cannister, you just lay it down...easy peasy.2) The cannister is pretty small, but it is super easy to remove and empty. And as long as I'm vacuuming as frequently as I should, I can vacuum my 2,000 sq ft home without having to empty the cannister. (I did have to empty frequently on my first use since this thing picked up way more than my old vacuum.)3) I found the chord to be the perfect length. Any longer and it would be too cumbersome. I can do all the living areas without moving the plug. It only has to be moved to reach the bedrooms.4) The motor is on top, so that does make the vacuum top heavy. But I think that makes it easier to maneuver, and its not so heavy as to make my arm tired, even when vacuuming the entire house. If you have trouble managing this vacuum, you would be better off with a roomba.5) But the reason I could sadly only give this product 4 starts...it does squeak. Loudly. :( The sound is akin to an entire basketball team squeaking new shoes on a gym floor. I have 2 very loud kids, so I have no problem tuning out the sound. But I could see it being a major issue for others. I like the vacuum enough to keep it anyway, but I will look for ways to stop the squeaking.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 10, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars In love!!! ... no longer
reviews.reviewText: Update: Holy waste of money! 4 months in and the roller has literally melted in the head. I can't even use this thing anymore. I am incredibly disappointed in the product. I usually love Bissell vacuums!With the mixed reviews this vacuum got I was skeptical but took a chance since I love my Crosswave. Holy cow! This thing is awesome! So let me address some of the concerns that caught my attention:It doesn't stand on its own: no it doesn't, but the first item you pull out of the box is a wall mount.The tank isn't large enough: umm how dirty is your floor? I vacuumed an almost 900 sq ft trailer and sucked up a bunch of cat litter that had been hiding and had room to spare.The wheels are squeaky: yeah they are but not annoyingly so.It doesn't go straight: it takes some finessing I'll give ya that. A slight lean to the left or right and its heading that way. Treat it like driving a car and you'll be fine. I liked how touchy it was.If you've gotten this far, let me tell you a feature I found that I don't recall seeing in the description: it has a hard floor and carpet setting that sits right by your thumb. You can change the floor type with hardly any effort. That is amazing. It's light, compact and sucks way harder then I expected. Worth every penny!!!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 9, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars BETTER THAN MY DYSON!!
reviews.reviewText: We have 2 dogs that shed VERY much & with me bring OCD about dog hair flooding my house, I have purchased numerous different vaccums over the last few years, including Dyson, Shark & a few other name brands. So when I was looking to purchase a new one, I spent hours looking at reviews for this one & I am SO glad I went with it! I swear it works better than all my previous vaccums including my Dyson that I spent over $500 on & it didn't even last 2 years & I didn't want to pay that kind of money again... PLUS... the suction on this one is incredible!!! I usually vaccum 1-2 times a week, so you'd think there wouldn't be so much damn dog hair!! I was mind blown with this vaccums capabilities & let me tell you... I was shook when I vacuumed only one floor of my 3 story home!! The pictures I've posted are literally after I had just vacuumed a few days prior with my Shark pet hair vaccum... pictures are worth 1000 words! So get one!! Oh & let me mention the warranty & customer service!! I originally bought my vaccum about 6 months ago & registered the warranty online & about 2 weeks ago, one of the parts on the roller broke & the company immediately sent a replacement that arrived 2 days later!!
